full_text: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR Jeffery DATE 4/1/05 TIME 11:45 A.M. M. Eva OF PHONE/MOBILE TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE Please call her back. She said it was important. SIGNED 1184 IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR Jeffery DATE 4/1/05 TIME 11:35 A.M. M. Darren OF PHONE/MOBILE TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE That he called SIGNED 1184 IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR Jeffery DATE 04/01/05 TIME 9:04 A.M. M. Jean-Luc OF PHONE/MOBILE 646 286 7000 TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE That he called again 07/26/17 Page 2247 IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR Jeffery DATE 4/1/05 TIME 8:31 A.M. M. Jean-Luc OF PHONE/MOBILE 646 286 7000 TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE Please call him back as soon as possible. It's very important. Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00032560

text_blocks.content: Please call her back. She said it was important.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned copy of a notepad with four 'Important Message' forms. The forms contain handwritten notes with messages for 'Jeffery' from various individuals. The document is in good condition, with some minor wear on the left edge due to the spiral binding.
